channel.title: Max Level, Level Formulas, Xp Gain Exeptions, and Dmg Formulas! PLZ HELP!
channel.description:
I am trying to do 4 things plz help if you can!
1. How do I change the max level skills and combat can be? 2. a. How do I change the formula for how much xp you need to level up? b. How do I change the formula for combat (like what skills/var effect you combat, and how much). 3. How can I make it so you only gain xp if *blank*. (like: in wildy lv 20+, attacking monster <20 levels below you, pvp, have certain weapon,etc) 4. a. How can I change the formula for how much max dmg you do. (like for ever str level +.5 max hit) b. How can I change the formula for the accuracy of your hits.
Most of these I just need the location of them. TY! I need help becuase I stoped my server for a couple of months and forgot...
P.S. 5. Where can I change the speed of different weapons and stuff? (I forgot also)[br][size=1]Posted on: November 16, 2007, 09:10:11 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? Or can this even be done?

item.description:
@Chaosis wrote:

I am trying to do 4 things plz help if you can!

  1. How do I change the max level skills and combat can be?
  2. a. How do I change the formula for how much xp you need to level up?

  4. a. How can I change the formula for how much max dmg you do. (like for ever str level +.5 max hit)
    b. How can I change the formula for the accuracy of your hits.

Most of these I just need the location of them. TY! I need help becuase I stoped my server for a couple of months and forgotâ€¦
